CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

After the warm up activity , MOT does not put each box away to complete an activity. Therefore , sometimes there are no clear distinctions between activities. Also , MOT blocks the camera view quite frequently throughout this tape.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . INV explains Warm-up Activity to MOT then leaves the room
<bef> MOT sits on the floor against the wall and picks up one of the toys
MOT holds the duck up and squeezes it in front of CHI
CHI reaches out and takes the duck from MOT . <aft> CHI looks at the duck
CHI has his back to the camera
MOT looks down to one side
MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT puts jack+in+the+box on the floor in front of CHI
MOT looks at the jack+in+the+box then at CHI
CHI looks down . CHI walks toward other toys on the floor
MOT picks up and puts down a series of toys
CHI bends down reaching for a toy
CHI has his back to the camera
MOT leans to one side while watching CHI
CHI rolls the car across the floor then puts one hand on the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves closer to CHI so she is leaning over him
MOT partially blocks CHI from view
MOT pushes the book to one side as she picks up the jack+in+the+box
CHI is blocked from camera view
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box in her lap and turns the crank
MOT looks at CHI then at clown
CHI is blocked from camera view
MOT stuffs the clown into the box
<bef> MOT shuts the lid . MOT places the jack+in+the+box on the floor in front of CHI
MOT leans forward and turns the crank
CHI is in partial view as MOT leans forward
MOT alternates looking at CHI and jack+in+the+box
CHI looks in general direction of jack+in+the+box but is still only in partial view
MOT stuffs clown back into the box and closes the lid
MOT blocks CHI completely from camera view
MOT's back is to the camera
MOT glances at CHI then looks down at jack+in+the+box
MOT holds jack+in+the+box up in front of CHI
CHI reaches for the clown and touches its head
MOT pushes clown into the box
<$=3> it is difficult to see if CHI is also pushing clown as MOT blocks the activity with her back
one side of CHI head is visible
<bef> MOT places the jack+in+the+box on the floor in front of CHI
CHI pushes clown down into the box
MOT completely blocks activity with her back
CHI is in partial view but the activity is still blocked by MOT
<$=5> MOT blocks activity . jack+in+the+box makes noise
MOT lays down on one side next to CHI on the floor
CHI kneels on the floor next to MOT and looks down
CHI attempts to turn the handle
MOT reaches over and covers CHI's hand with her hand
CHI looks down . <aft> CHI looks at MOT then over his shoulder toward the camera
CHI pulls his hand away from crank
CHI lets gop of the clown and it pops up again
CHI looks at the clown while touching its head
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box back and forth so that the clown sways
CHI tries to touch the clown
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box back and forth so that the clown sways . <aft> MOT puts the clown up to CHI's face then places the jack+in+the+box on the floor in front of CHI
CHI tries to grab the clown . <aft> CHI pushes the clown into the box
MOT has changed her position somewhat so she is blocking the full activity . CHI's back is to the camera
CHI's activity is blocked by MOT
CHI pushes the clown up and down repeatedly
CHI is blocked to some degree by MOT
CHI does something with the jack+in+the+box but is blocked from view
CHI plays with jack+in+the+box but activity is blocked from view
MOT sits back so activity is visible
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT leans forward closer to CHI then looks at CHI
MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box and puts it up to CHI's face
MOT taps CHI face with the clown then places the jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI pushes the clown into its box
CHI reaches for the toy car
<aft> CHI rolls the car back and forth on the floor beside him
CHI picks up the football in his other hand . <aft> CHI taps the football with the car
CHI looks at the toys in his hands
MOT starts to get up off the floor
CHI drops the ball . <aft> CHI claps his hands with the car
CHI looks straight ahead then glances over at MOT
MOT gets up on her knees then reaches for another toy
<aft> MOT squeaks the toy duck and tosses it over in CHI's direction
<bef> MOT picks up the duck again and squeaks it
MOT looks across the room toward the desk
MOT moves across the room on her knees
CHI picks up a toy off the floor with his back to the camera
<aft> CHI turns around and looks at MOT
MOT places a stool on the floor beside CHI
MOT sits down facing CHI with her back to the camera
MOT taps the chair a couple of times
CHI looks down at toy in his hands
CHI continues to squeak the toy
MOT sits back and watches CHI
<bef> MOT picks up the book and places it on the floor in front of her . <aft> MOT opens the book and looks through the pages
CHI looks in the direction of the book then up at the door
INV explains Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room
INV enters the room and explains Forbidden object to MOT
INV places object on the table in front of CHI
MOT looks at CHI then reaches for his hand

MOT puts CHI's wrist in her mouth

CHI reaches for object with his free hand

MOT tickles CHI under his arms

MOT rubs CHI's head then watches INV put the object away
INV puts the object in the drawer
INV explains PCI boxes to MOT then leaves the room

CHI takes a step toward MOT while kicking the ball gently
MOT points into the box briefly

CHI looks at and touches the chair
CHI looks across the room then at MOT while standing next to the chair
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI while pointing to the ball
<bef> CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks down in the direction of the ball

MOT hides the ball behind her back

<aft> MOT tosses the ball against the door
CHI takes a few steps toward MOT
MOT kneels in the middle of the floor with her back to the camera
CHI walks past MOT then turns around and looks in her direction
MOT turns her back on CHI and reaches for another box on the desk
MOT takes a box off the desk then settles on the floor by the desk with the box on her lap
MOT is not completely in camera range
CHI looks down as he walks toward MOT
MOT opens the box and removes the towel
CHI stops while standing in front of MOT . CHI looks at the towel
CHI glances down at the box then up at the towel then down at the box again
CHI bends down and tries to pick up the box
MOT picks up the box and puts it in front of her face
MOT peers out from behind the box and looks at CHI then hides behind the box again
CHI moves around beside MOT as if to get a better look behind the box . <aft> CHI looks at MOT while leaning against the chair by the desk
MOT scoots away from CHI on her knees while hiding behind the box
MOT has moved across the room so she now faces CHI

MOT drapes the towel over the box

CHI looks away from MOT and down at something on the floor . <aft> CHI takes a few steps toward the chair
